bibl.title: Nine Homeric Papyri from Oxyrhynchos.

series.title: Studi e Testi di Papirologia. N.S.

bibl.note: Doct. thesis, Univ. of London, 1990. - The papyri published here have been assigned numbers 4630-4638 in the main P. Oxy. sequence, and a list of their contents appears (without texts) in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri LXVII. - Prolegomena. - 4630-4637. Scholia Minora in B; - 4638. Iliad B 191-287 (227-53 in lacuna) with Speaker Indications. - Index of Lemmata. - Appendix 1: The Manuscripts of D - Text Samples. - Appendix 2: PB and D - Text Samples. - Appendix 3: Homeric Papyri with Speaker Indications. - Epilegomena. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: SPOONER Joseph (edited by), Nine Homeric Papyri from Oxyrhynchos. (Studi e Testi di Papirologia. N.S. 1.)
Firenze, Istituto Papirologico "G. Vitelli", 2002, 8°, xii-213 pp. et 9 pll. dépl. ISBN 88-87829-24-1. €41.

Doct. thesis, Univ. of London, 1990. - The papyri published here have been assigned numbers 4630-4638 in the main P. Oxy. sequence, and a list of their contents appears (without texts) in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri LXVII. - Prolegomena. - 4630-4637. Scholia Minora in B; - 4638. Iliad B 191-287 (227-53 in lacuna) with Speaker Indications. - Index of Lemmata. - Appendix 1: The Manuscripts of D - Text Samples. - Appendix 2: PB and D - Text Samples. - Appendix 3: Homeric Papyri with Speaker Indications. - Epilegomena. Bibliography.
C.R. par Grace H. Ioannidou, BibO 60 (2003) coll. 620-622. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 80 (2005) Nos 159-160, pp. 331-333. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 49 (2003) pp. 113-114.
